titles.title: Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial Act
A bill to designate a Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial at the March Field Air Museum in Riverside, California.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 112-214.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 5/2/2011--Introduced. Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial Act - Designates the memorial at March Field Air Museum in Riverside, California, as the Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial, in honor of current and former members of the armed forces who have been awarded the Distinguished Flying Cross.
